channel.title: My New Hugo Site

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am originally from Topeka, KS and am currently a senior finishing my undergraduate degree in Mathematics and Physics at Kansas State University in Manhattan, KS. I will be pursuing my Ph.D. in mathematics at Purdue University this fall. After my Ph.D., my ultimate goal is to be a professor at a university and teach and conduct research full time. My current research interests and in applied math and PDE, and I am particularly fond of mathematical application to physics, especially within wave equations.
